attributes.action: Challenge the non complaince with UN Convention for the rights of the child!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is being launched in both the UK and Ireland calling for the governments to follow more stringently the Un Convention on the Rights of the Child and also to challenge those countries openly who have signed to the convention but choose openly not to follow them! This petition has been launched by a group of young people from Northern Ireland (Lisburn YMCA) and Eire (Dublin YMCA) To create more awareness of the use of child soldiers globally it will intertwine with the Day of Proposed action and Child Soldiers International Awareness Day on February 12th 2008.
